item.title: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint (MDE) Live Response and Performance Script.
item.description:
Importance of MDE Live Response and Scripts
Live Response is crucial for incident response and forensic investigations. It enables analysts to:
Collect evidence remotely. Run diagnostics without interrupting users. Remediate threats in real time.
